short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of leaking guessed worlds? Don't show guessed terms, don't show phrases while you are drawing them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of leaking guessed worlds?
- Hide guessed words
- Hide phrases while you are drawing them
- Just you will be able to see word that you need to draw

Note: You can toggle the streamer mode by clicking the extension
